About Me

I am an aspiring student pursuing a bachelor's degree in Computer Science at Ohio University. Last summer I had an internship with RSK Tech in Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan where I had a chance to apply my programming knowledge in mobile development using Flutter. I have experience in mobile development and currently looking for software developing job this summer. The programming languages I used/use for programming projects and work are Java, C++, Flutter, and Python.

Driver Drowsiness Detection System

Mobile application that displays real-time drowsiness data and triggers alerts upon detecting drowsiness, integrating Firebase to securely associate data with individual users. The app complements the Raspberry Pi and camera module used for drowsiness detection. Users can access their previous drives' drowsiness data as well as customize alert sounds.

Flutter Python Firebase OpenCV Dlib

Medicine Reminder App

Developing a mobile application in Flutter that sends notifications to remind individuals to take a particular medicine at a specific time. Working on enabling a dual-user system for patients and doctors, utilizing Firebase for authentication and data storage, allowing doctors to send patients personalized medication lists, which automatically set up reminders on patients' phones

Flutter Firebase

Boop (board game)

Developed a Boop game in C++ with the user being able to play against the computer. Utilized Object-Oriented Analysis and Design concepts along with Alpha-beta pruning in the design of the AI.

C++
